messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: HOP hasss my tail now, I do not

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Power Systems Nominal

Power has been restored to Lizard Station 26. We apologize for the inconvenience.

messages.author: Head of Security's Desk
messages.body: CAPTAIN IS FORCING PEOPLE TO HAVE TAILS SURGICALY ADDED. RUN BOYS.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Central Command Higher Dimensional Affairs

An acausal dimensional event has been detected in your sector. Event has been flagged EXTINCTION-CLASS. Directing all available assets toward simulating solutions. SOLUTION ETA: 60 SECONDS.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Central Command Higher Dimensional Affairs

Simulations on acausal dimensional event complete. Deploying solution package now. Deployment ETA: ONE MINUTE.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Gravitational anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Security Post - Engineering.
